titles.title: ANCSA Thirteenth Regional Corporation Reincorporation Act of 2017
A bill to establish a Regional Corporation for Natives who are non-residents of Alaska, and for other purposes.
ANCSA Thirteenth Regional Corporation Reincorporation Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
ANCSA Thirteenth Regional Corporation Reincorporation Act of 2017
This bill requires the Department of Interior to convene a meeting of the shareholders of the thirteenth Alaska Native regional corporation, which is for Alaska Natives who are not residents of Alaska, for the purpose of electing a board of directors.
